ing.item: Red pepper flakes; may be doubled
Onion; cut into wedges and separated into 1-inch strips

directions.step:
In small bowl, combine honey, stir fry sauce and crushed red pepper flakes; set aside. In wok or large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat; add vegetables and toss while cooking, about 2-3 minutes. Add honey sauce, stir until all vegetables are glazed and sauce is bubbly hot, about 1 minute. Serve as a vegetable side dish or over steamed rice or noodles for a main dish. Makes 4 servings.
Prep: 10 minutes/Cook 5 minutes
Nutrients Per Serving: 168 calories, 4.9 g fat (24% calories from fat), 0 mg cholesterol, 2.6 g protein, 31 g carbohydrates, 3 g dietary fiber, 74 mg sodium.
NOTES: Recipes follow American Heart Associations Recommended Dietary Guidelines Nutrition Analysis: Nutritionist IV Diet Analysis, (c) 1995
